summary.para: Takes the greater of two corresponding elements from the input tensors, and places the result into the corresponding element of the output tensor.
This operator supports in-place execution, meaning that OutputTensor is permitted to alias one of the the input tensors during binding.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_MAX_OPERATOR_DESC.ATensor
member.summary: A tensor containing the left-hand side inputs.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_MAX_OPERATOR_DESC.BTensor
member.summary: A tensor containing the right-hand side inputs.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_MAX_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The output tensor to write the results to.
